capture.title: Data Integration Management
capture.description: You can configure data integrations here to collect information from various sources such as your connected devices or external APIs.
capture.endpStatFrameRxDesc: Total number of frames received by the capture endpoint
capture.endpStatAccToPivotDesc: Total number of frames accepted to pivot
capture.endpStatInDriverDesc: Total number of frames processed by the driver
capture.endpStatAccToProcDesc: Total number of privot accepted to process
capture.endpStatQToProcDesc: Total number of pivot in queue for processing
capture.endpStatOwnerDesc: Total number of frames refused due to bad owner reference
capture.endpStatPayloadDesc: Total number of frames refused due to bad payload format
capture.endpStatRightDesc: Total number of frames refused due to bad device rights by the capture endpoint
capture.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this capture endpoint? This action is irreversible.
capture.errorDeletingEndpoints: An error occurred while deleting the capture endpoint
capture.unknownError: An unknown error occurred, please try again later.
capture.deleteSuccessDesc: The capture endpoint has been successfully deleted.
capture.endpName: Name to give to the capture endpoint
capture.endpNameDesc: The name should be meaningful to the user, it has no particular function other than to easily identify the capture endpoint for the user.
capture.endpDescriptionDesc: The description should provide additional information about the capture endpoint, helping to better understand its role or specifics.
capture.endpEncryptionDesc: This option allows encrypting the data stored in the database for this capture endpoint, thereby increasing the security of the collected information.
capture.endpWideOpenDesc: This option forces the capture endpoint to be open to all devices, including those that do not belong to you, as long as they have a valid access key. This option is enabled by default on certain protocols and can be used for others. This option presents a security risk.
capture.endpProtocolFamilyDesc: Choose the protocol family for this endpoint.
capture.endpProtocolTypeDesc: Choose the protocol type within the selected family.
capture.endpProtocolVersionDesc: Choose the protocol version for this endpoint.
capture.capture-protocol-not-found: The requested protocol was not found in available protocols
capture.capture-endpoint-not-found: The requested endpoint was not found in available endpoints
capture.capture-ingest-right-error: You don't have the rights to ingest data on this endpoint
capture.capture-ingest-protocol-class-error: The protocol processing class is invalid or not found
capture.capture-ingest-protocol-missing-method: The protocol processing class is missing the required toPivot method
capture.capture-ingest-parse-error: An error occurred while parsing the incoming data
capture.capture-ingest-closing-or-overloaded: The capture endpoint is closing or overloaded, ingestion is not possible
capture.capture-async-service-closing: The capture async service is closing, ingestion is not possible
capture.capture-async-service-overloaded: The capture async service is overloaded, ingestion is not possible
capture.capture-endpoint-user-not-authorized: The user is not authorized to create capture endpoint
capture.capture-endpoint-name-missing: The capture endpoint name is missing
capture.capture-endpoint-protocol-missing: The capture endpoint protocol is missing
capture.capture-endpoint-mandatory-fields-missin: Some mandatory fields are missing in the capture endpoint definition
capture.capture-endpoint-mandatory-field-missing: At least one of the mandatory field is missing in the capture endpoint definition
capture.capture-endpoint-ref-generation-failed: Server error : failed to generate a unique reference for the capture endpoint, please retry later
capture.capture-endpoint-list-user-not-authorize: The user is not authorized to list capture endpoint
capture.capture-endpoint-delete-success: The capture endpoint has been successfully deleted
capture.capture-endpoint-delete-no-rights: You don't have the rights to delete this endpoint
capture.capture-endpoint-created: The capture endpoint has been successfully created
capture.protocol-family-invalid-format: The protocol family format is invalid
capture.protocol-type-invalid-format: The protocol type format is invalid
capture.protocol-version-invalid-format: The protocol version format is invalid
capture.protocol-description-invalid-format: The protocol description format is invalid
capture.lorawan-helium-chirpstack-v4-bad-timesta: The timestamp format is invalid, replaced by RxTime
capture.capture-driver-helium-chirpstackv4-bad-t: The timestamp format is invalid, replaced by RxTime or 0
capture.capture-driver-helium-chirpstackv4-missi: Gateway ID missiing in the metadata
capture.capture-driver-helium-chirpstackv4-unkno: The device is not found in the system
capture.capture-driver-helium-chirpstackv4-no-ri: Injector has no rights to ingest data for a device
